mapper.select: select company.com_id, company.com_name, company.com_addr, company.com_web, company.com_regnum, company.com_email, company.com_mgr_tel, company.com_tel, company.com_bus, company.com_img, comm.* from company, comm where company.com_sec=comm.sub_cat and company.com_id='znvkd323' and comm.main_cat='050'

select * from ( select rownum rn, z.* from ( select m.user_id, m.user_img, a.app_regdate, an.anno_c_regdate, an.anno_regdate, an.anno_code from member m, apply a, announce an where m.user_id = a.user_id and a.anno_code = an.anno_code and an.com_id = 'tlstprp5184' and ANNO_C_REGDATE > sysdate ) z ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select * from ( select rownum rn, z.* from ( select m.user_id, m.user_img, a.app_regdate, an.anno_c_regdate, an.anno_regdate, an.anno_code from member m, apply a, announce an where m.user_id = a.user_id and a.anno_code = an.anno_code and an.com_id = 'tlstprp5184' and ANNO_C_REGDATE < sysdate ) z ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select comm.*, mem.*, res.res_tag1, res.res_tag2, res.res_tag3 from member mem, resume res, comm where mem.user_id=res.user_id and comm.sub_cat=mem.user_edu

select * from ( select rownum rn, a.* from (select b.com_id, m.user_id, m.user_img, b.mrk_date from member m, bookmark b where m.user_id = b.user_id and b.com_id = 'tlstprp5184') a ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select distinct c.comm_ctx from member m inner join comm c on m.user_job_tag = c.sub_cat where main_cat = 001 and m.user_job_tag = #{user_job_tag}
